meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Alcohol</kanji> that comes from <kanji>ume</kanji> is <vocabulary>ume wine</vocabulary>. It can also be called <vocabulary>plum wine</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>plum liquor</vocabulary>. If you're of age give it a taste, it's quite nice!
readingMnemonic: The reading is just the readings of the kanji that you learned. How about a toast to easy to read words!
